content: Il bianco aveva un vantaggio di scambio (torre contro alfiere), oltre a un pedone passato in a3. La vittoria era una questione di tecnica.
translations: eng:White was up the exchange (rook against bishop) with a passed pawn on a3. The win was a matter of technique
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
